I could see it being a complementary service one glass not shots or hard liquor. I worked years ago in a fancy pants salon where thursdays were our late night caviar, bree, fruit, champagne, wine, and pate were all served. It was a great marketing scheme. Also when I do a bridal party chances are they bring champagne and orange juice to celebrate. It's moderation and responsibility for me.
